title: inta kOpamElarA (varNa)
sahitya:
(rAgA:  nATa)   
  inta kOpamElarA idipaini nIku
			(rAgA:  gauLa)


anupallavi

  centa jErinanu pantamElarA shrI kALahastIshvara
(two other sets of svarAs are also sung in varALi and Arabhi)
			(rAg  shrI)


caraNam    panca sharuni bAri kOrva jAladurA
(other sets of svarAs are also sung in nArAyaNagauLa, rItigauLa, bauLi and kEdAra)
